short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension empowers your research endeavors by providing an AI-powered Research Genius integrated with ChatGPT. Click the button and enter your topic of interest to access a vast database of relevant literature, articles, and resources. Whether you need scholarly sources, research papers, or specific information, the Research Genius will curate a collection of valuable resources tailored to your requirements.
